thread.section_title: Skyline Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Perfect
thread.title_full: Perfect - Review of Skyline Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: donnar28
title: Perfect
text: We are still staying at the skyline, leaving tomorrow, checked in we'd 22nd march, check in was super quick and the reception were very friendly, all the staff we came across were lovely and very helpful, the room was a really good size and spotlessly clean, bathroom lovely and plenty of room, view from our room on 4th floor at the front was really nice at night, not far from times Square, and we used a taxi if needed (reasonably priced we thought). We would recommend this hotel to anybody wanting to stay in new York close to most things but not too noisy. Skyline deli across the road is absolutely fab, low prices and wonderful food open 24 hours a day, last thing the swimming pool is an added bonus and really nice. Thank-you skyline hotel for a wonderful stay
